what: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
title: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
text: data package contains data set registered elevator devices New York City provided Department Buildings response September 2015 FOIL request.

title: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
text: can install development version elevators like :

title: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
code: library(elevators) library(ggplot2)  elevators |>   ggplot(aes(speed_fpm, capacity_lbs)) +   geom_point(alpha = 0.1) +   annotate("point", 125, 3000, color = "red") +   annotate("segment", x = 1000, xend = 225, y = 25000, yend = 6000,            colour = "red", size = 1, arrow = arrow()) +   annotate("text", x = 1500, y = 28000, label = "RStudio Office", color = "red")

title: Elevators in NYC — elevators
text: data set containing information subset elevators NYC. data set filtered contain active elevators non-missing speed.

title: Elevators in NYC — elevators
text: data frame 35042 rows 24 variables: device_number Unique identify number elevator bin Building Identification Number borough Regional subdivisions NYC. One "Manhattan", "Bronx", "Brooklyn", "Queens", "Staten Island" tax_block Id tax block. Smaller borough tax_lot Id tax block. Smaller tax_block house_number House number, poorly parsed. Use caution street_name Street name, poorly parsed. Use caution zip_code Zip code, formatted 5 digits. 0 99999 marked NA device_type Type device. common type "Passenger Elevator" lastper_insp_date Date, refers last periodic inspection Department Buildings. dates longer accurate, collected November 2015 approval_date Date approval elevator manufacturer Name manufacturer, poorly cleaned. assigned NA travel_distance Distance travelled, cleaned. Mixed formats speed_fpm Speed feet/minute capacity_lbs Capacity lbs car_buffer_type Buffer type. buffer device designed stop descending car counterweight beyond normal limit soften force elevator runs pit emergency. Takes values "Oil", "Spring", NA governor_type Governor type, overspeed governor elevator device acts stopping mechanism case elevator runs beyond rated speed machine_type Machine type, labels unknown. safety_type Safety type, labels unknown. mode_operation Operation mode, labels unknown. floor_from Lowest floor, cleaned. Mixed formats floor_to Highest floor, cleaned. Mixed formats latitude Latitude elevator longitude Longitude elevator
